item.title: usememos/memos
item.description: An open-source, self-hosted note-taking service. Your thoughts, your data, your control â€” no tracking, no ads, no subscription fees.

item.title: logseq/logseq
item.description: A privacy-first, open-source platform for knowledge management and collaboration. Download link: http://github.com/logseq/logseq/releases. roadmap: https://discuss.logseq.com/t/logseq-product-roadmap/34267

item.title: laurent22/joplin
item.description: Joplin - the privacy-focused note taking app with sync capabilities for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android and iOS.

item.title: siyuan-note/siyuan
item.description: A privacy-first, self-hosted, fully open source personal knowledge management software, written in typescript and golang.

item.title: AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy
item.description: Bring projects, wikis, and teams together with AI. AppFlowy is the AI collaborative workspace where you achieve more without losing control of your data. The leading open source Notion alternative.

item.title: foambubble/foam
item.description: A personal knowledge management and sharing system for VSCode

item.title: Smaug6739/Alexandrie
item.description: Alexandrie is a fast, modern, and open-source web application for Markdown note taking, designed for students, creators, and knowledge workers seeking a productive and flexible tool. Build structured notes using an extended Markdown syntax, organize them with workspaces and categories, and work seamlessly both online and offline.

item.title: silverbulletmd/silverbullet
item.description: An open source personal productivity platform built on Markdown, turbo charged with the scripting power of Lua

item.title: pbek/QOwnNotes
item.description: QOwnNotes is a plain-text file notepad and todo-list manager with Markdown support and Nextcloud / ownCloud integration.

item.title: brufdev/many-notes
item.description: Markdown note-taking web application designed for simplicity
